meanings.definition: Tending to cling or adhere closely
meanings.sent1: The wet shirt felt clingy against my skin.
meanings.sent2: The clingy fabric stuck to the wall.
meanings.sent3: The clingy tape refused to let go of the box.
meanings.sent4: The clingy toddler held onto his mother's leg.
meanings.sent5: The clingy vines wrapped tightly around the tree trunk.

meanings.definition: Having a strong emotional attachment or dependence
meanings.sent1: The clingy child didn't want to let go of his favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: She felt clingy towards her best friend.
meanings.sent3: The clingy puppy followed its owner everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The clingy student always sought reassurance from the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The clingy partner constantly needed attention and affection.
